Sentencas: Microstructural correlations of impregnated freeze tape cast scaffolds for solid oxide cells are studied by coupling experimental and modelling approaches.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: The functional and supporting layers of the hierarchical porous backbones are initially reconstructed by synchrotron X-ray microand nano-holotomography, respectively.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: A particle-based model was then built to numerically infiltrate the scaffold walls with hemispherical nanoparticles.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: The electrode microstructural properties are evaluated on the artificially impregnated electrodes as function of the catalyst loading.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: A parametric investigation on the effect of the nanoparticle size isperformed to analyse the evolution of the electrode characteristics.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: It has been shown that the volume fraction of the infiltrated phase necessary to reach the percolating threshold is increased while increasing the nanoparticle size.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: The density of active sites presents a maximum as function of the catalyst loading that depends on the particle size.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: The volume fraction of infiltrated phase required to reach the percolating threshold in the diffusion layer is one order of magnitude lower than in the functional layer (1 vol% compared to 3-8 vol%, respectively).
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation

Sentencas: The analyses contained in this paper aim at guiding the manufacturing process to the shaping of innovative electrodes microstructures combining both high activation and mass transfer properties.
Titulo: The design optimization of nanostructured hierarchical electrodes for solid oxide cells by artificial impregnation
